proposal1.heroHeadline: Revolutionize Your Proposal Process with Instant AI Automation
proposal1.heroSubheadline: Eliminate manual proposal writing and save hours every week with our AI-driven solution.
proposal1.problemsIntro: Six systemic issues affecting your growth and engineering bandwidth right now.

problems.title: Legacy Platform Lock-in
problems.description: Your current systems are outdated, requiring excessive resources to maintain and upgrade, which hampers your ability to innovate and scale.

problems.title: Manual Proposal Processes
problems.description: Creating proposals manually is time-consuming and error-prone, leading to inefficiencies and potential loss of business opportunities.

problems.title: Inefficient Resource Allocation
problems.description: A significant portion of your team's time is spent on repetitive tasks, leaving less time for strategic initiatives that drive business growth.

problems.title: Integration Challenges
problems.description: Disparate systems that do not communicate effectively lead to data silos and hinder seamless operations across your organization.

problems.title: Compliance and Security Risks
problems.description: Maintaining compliance with industry standards like HIPAA is challenging without integrated and automated systems, increasing the risk of data breaches.

problems.title: Lack of Real-time Insights
problems.description: Without automated data collection and analysis, decision-making is based on outdated information, slowing down your response to market changes.

proposal1.solutionIntro: Five integrated workstreams covering every dimension of transformation.

solutions.title: Automated Proposal Generation
solutions.description: Instantly create accurate, customized proposals with our AI-driven system, freeing up valuable time and resources.

solutions.title: Enhanced Compliance Management
solutions.description: Automate compliance checks and ensure your operations meet industry standards without added overhead.

solutions.title: Seamless Systems Integration
solutions.description: Achieve seamless communication across all platforms, ensuring data is unified and accessible in real-time.

solutions.title: Real-time Data Analysis
solutions.description: Leverage AI to provide real-time insights that inform better decision-making and strategic planning.

solutions.title: Scalable Infrastructure
solutions.description: Build an infrastructure that supports growth and innovation, allowing you to adapt quickly to market demands.

metrics.label: Higher portal adoption with modern UX

whyUsCards.title: Open Source First

proposal1.teamIntro: Your engagement is led directly by our CEO. No handoffs to junior account managers.

team.name: Ayush Chauhan
team.bio: Leads strategy, client partnerships, and technical direction. Personally oversees every enterprise engagement from discovery through launch.

proposal1.processIntro: What Working With Us Looks Like

process.title: Discovery and Architecture
process.description: Audit existing systems, map integrations, and define technical architecture.

process.title: Design and Prototyping
process.description: Create prototypes and design user-centric interfaces to validate concepts.

process.title: Development and Integration
process.description: Develop core functionalities and integrate with existing systems for a seamless experience.

process.title: Testing and Quality Assurance
process.description: Conduct thorough testing to ensure systems meet all requirements and perform optimally.

process.title: Deployment and Support
process.description: Deploy the final solution and provide ongoing support to ensure sustained success.

proposal1.pricingIntro: Three engagement tiers. Choose the depth of transformation that aligns with your priorities.

pricing.name: Core
pricing.subtitle: // Website + CMS Migration
pricing.description: Migrate and redesign the platform your team controls.

pricing.name: Complete
pricing.subtitle: // Full Digital Transformation
pricing.description: Website, integrations, compliance, and DevOps infrastructure.

pricing.name: Strategic
pricing.subtitle: // Ongoing Partnership
pricing.description: Full transformation plus an ongoing retainer for continuous optimization.

proposal2.heroHeadline: Transforming Acme Corp's Digital Experience Into a Growth Engine
proposal2.heroSubheadline: A structured engagement plan for website redesign, product UX, and ongoing digital performance. Built for where you are heading.
proposal2.problemsIntro: Six friction points costing your business growth, trust, and engineering bandwidth right now.

problems.title: Brand and Product Disconnect
problems.description: Your website communicates reliability, but your product interface tells a different story.

problems.title: Outdated Design
problems.description: The current design does not reflect your innovative spirit and limits user engagement.

problems.title: Complex User Journeys
problems.description: Navigation is not intuitive, leading to user frustration and drop-offs.

problems.title: Slow Load Times
problems.description: Page speed is affecting user experience and search engine rankings.

problems.title: Inconsistent Mobile Experience
problems.description: Your mobile site does not offer the same quality experience as desktop, alienating a major user segment.

problems.title: Limited Analytics
problems.description: Lack of comprehensive analytics hinders data-driven decision making.

proposal2.solutionIntro: Four integrated workstreams designed to address every problem area identified above.

lead.company_description:
Unleashed is a one-stop shop for leading web development, custom software and digital services. We create, enhance, integrate, manage, and host award-winning websites, web applications, and digital experiences through the continuous efforts of our certified developers and a team of creative digital strategists. At Unleashed, we utilize open-source platforms‚Äîthe most collaborative and dynamic solutions available for our clients' websites and system integrations. 
By living on the cutting edge of web technology and development, Unleashed has the proven experience and expertise to create award-winning digital experiences. As globally recognized web experts, we are committed to positioning our clients to fully realize digital potential through dynamic, engaging websites using open-source solutions. 

We're not afraid... 
...of inheriting legacy code. 
...of complex, third-party integrations. 
...of responding to your evolving needs. 

OUR SERVICES INCLUDE: 
:: Open Source Platforms (i.e., WordPress, Drupal, Symfony, Adobe Commerce)
:: Responsive Web Design
:: Web App Development
:: Optimization
:: Web Accessibility & Compliance
:: Systems Integrations
:: Web Personalization
:: e-Commerce Implementation
:: Creative and Design Services
:: DevOps and Hosting Services
:: Digital Marketing Services
:: Ongoing Support Services
lead.headline: CEO @unleashed Technologies | Solving Your Digital/AI Needs In Manufacturing, Associations & Life Sciences
lead.company_technologies: ai, android, bluekai, cloudflare, cloudflare hosting, cloudflare dns, drupal, flutter, gmail, google apps, iot, magento, microsoft office 365, outlook, python, rackspace mailgun, react, remote, sharepoint
